thread.section_title: Luna Bazaar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luna Bazaar | www.lunabazaar.com | 2 of 66
thread.title: Deanna

author: Deanna
title: Deanna
text: my daughter is getting married in april and i wanted the perfect memory for her and her soon to be husband. Luna Bazaar had so many wonderful things to choose from but when i saw the mercury glass hearts i knew they were the ones. i am painting their names and dates on the hearts and i know they will love them thank you for the product quality and the fast and easy transaction not to mention how well they were packaged and arrived so fast
